description: Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission reference 223366FUL dated 15/02/2023 for' Conversion of existing building from 6no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage'. Amendment seeks alterations to alterations to the size and positioning of rear fenestration; Alterations to positioning of windows to north flank elevation; Creation of one window at first floor level to south flank elevation; Level changes to side passage and repositioning of approved access gate; and Provision of further detail in relation to construction methodology with reference to the front fa√ßade.
decision_conditions: The creation of one window at first floor level to south flank elevation would not constitute a non-material amendment to the original planning permission 223366FUL dated 15/02/2023. As such, the proposed change would not fall within the remit of Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
